title: Navigate forwards to a meter in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the meter
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the meter.
assertion2: Name 'Central Processing Unit (CPU) Usage' is conveyed

title: Navigate forwards to a meter
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the meter
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the meter.
assertion2: Name 'Central Processing Unit (CPU) Usage' is conveyed

title: Navigate backwards to a meter in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the meter
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the meter.
assertion2: Name 'Central Processing Unit (CPU) Usage' is conveyed

title: Navigate backwards to a meter
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the meter
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the meter.
assertion2: Name 'Central Processing Unit (CPU) Usage' is conveyed

title: Read information about a meter in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the meter, read information about the meter
assertion2: Name 'Central Processing Unit (CPU) Usage' is conveyed

title: Read information about a meter
instructions: With focus on the meter, read information about the meter
assertion2: Name 'Central Processing Unit (CPU) Usage' is conveyed

title: Trigger meter updates in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the 'Change Value' button
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Change Value' button, activate the button to trigger the meter updates.
assertion1: 1:Updated value is not conveyed: screen reader stays silent.

title: Trigger meter updates in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the 'Change Value' button
instructions: With focus on the 'Change Value' button, activate the button to trigger the meter updates.
assertion1: 1:Updated value is not conveyed: screen reader stays silent.

title: Trigger meter updates
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the 'Change Value' button
instructions: With focus on the 'Change Value' button, activate the button to trigger the meter updates.
assertion1: 1:Updated value is not conveyed: screen reader stays silent.
